EmailTemplate.subject: [Exclusive Invitation] Ipreo's End of Year Celebration Party at Armani/Privé
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Zacor
It's time to celebrate!
Ipreo is pleased to invite you to our annual end of year party for clients and friends. Join us on the glamorous rooftop terrace at Armani/Privé with the luminous view of Hong Kong cityscape while enjoying the following:
Drinks & canapés Networking with fellow industry professionals Music and fun!
As this is a free-to-attend event, entry will be on a first-come first-serve basis.
Also note that this event times nicely with the IR Magazine Conference & Awards earlier in the day. For more info visit here.
Mark your calendar
Date: December 6, 2017 Time: 7-10PM Venue: Armani/Privé, 3/F, Chater House, 8 Connaught Road, Central, Hong Kong | Map
Getting there
Armani/Privé is easily accessible from Exit E of the Central MTR station.When coming out of the underground MTR Exit E, Landmark Chater will be on the left-hand side. There is a dedicated escalator entrance to both Armani/Prive lounge, club and terrace.
